messageBody:

i need help. i have file with this code


package com.test.foundation.businessdelegate.country;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import
com.test.commom.interfaces.businessdelegate.BusinessDelegateInterface;
import com.test.foundation.entity.country.CountryData;
import com.test.util.Resource;


public class CountryServiceBusinessDelegate implements
BusinessDelegateInterface {
Resource resource = null;
Connection conn = null;


public void setConnection(Connection conn) {
this.conn = conn;
}


public Connection getConnection() {
return conn;
}


public boolean closeConnection() {
return false;
}


public CountryData findAddressByAddressId(int id) throws
SQLException, NullPointerException {
CountryData country = null;
PreparedStatement stmt = null;
ResultSet rs = null;


stmt =
this.getConnection().prepareStatement(Resource.getFileProperty().getProperty("country.findCountryByCountryId"));
stmt.setInt(1, id);
rs = stmt.executeQuery();

if (rs.next()) {
country.setCountryId(rs.getInt("countryid"));
country.setAcronym(rs.getString("acronym"));
country.setDescription(rs.getString("description"));

} else {
country = null;
throw new NullPointerException();
}
return country;
}
}
